channel.title: representative computer expo on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in representative computer expo on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
CeBIT Logo
CeBIT was the largest and most internationally representative computer expo. The trade fair was held each year on the Hanover fairground, the world’s largest fairground, in Hanover, Germany. In its day, it was considered a barometer of current trends and a measure of the state of the art in information technology. It was organized by Deutsche Messe AG. With an exhibition area of roughly 450,000 m² and a peak attendance of 850,000 visitors during the dot-com boom, it was larger both in area and attendance than its Asian counterpart COMPUTEX and its no-longer held American equivalent COMDEX.
You can download theCeBITlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: CeBIT
item.description: CeBIT was the largest and most internationally representative computer expo. The trade fair was held each year on the Hanover fairground, the world’s largest fairground, in Hanover, Germany. In its day, it was considered a barometer of current trends and a measure of the state of the art in information technology. It was organized by Deutsche Messe AG. With an exhibition area of roughly 450,000 m² and a peak attendance of 850,000 visitors during the dot-com boom, it was larger both in area and attendance than its Asian counterpart COMPUTEX and its no-longer held American equivalent COMDEX.
